question: Analyze trends in technology adoption across different industries for the past year.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify the industries to analyze based on their technology adoption trends","table":["IndustryITTrend"]},{"step":2,"task":"Extract data on specific technologies adopted within these industries in the past year","table":["CompanyTechStack","IndustryITTrend"]},{"step":3,"task":"Evaluate the financial performance of companies in those industries to correlate with technology adoption trends","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":4,"task":"Summarize findings and present insights on which technologies are driving success in different industries","table":["IndustryITTrend","CompanyInfo"]}]}
